content.question: Jordan’s cell phone plan includes <math alttext="5"><mn>5</mn></math> gigabytes (GB) of data per month and has a monthly cost of <math alttext="dollar sign 79.95"><semantics><mrow><mo>$</mo><mn>79.95</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. If Jordan uses more than <math alttext="5"><mn>5</mn></math> GB of data within the month, there is a charge of <math alttext="dollar sign 10"><semantics><mrow><mo>$</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> per additional gigabyte of data used. Function <math alttext="C"><mi>C</mi></math> is used to model Jordan’s monthly cell phone bill, where <math alttext="d"><mi>d</mi></math> is the number of gigabytes of data used and <math alttext="C open parentheses d close parentheses"><mi>C</mi><mfenced><mi>d</mi></mfenced></math> is the cost in dollars. Which of the following defines function <math alttext="C"><mi>C</mi></math> ?
